title: An Act to expand designation of priority development sites

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Kassner of Hamilton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2302) of Kristin E. Kassner for legislation to expand designation of priority development sites.  Municipalities and Regional Government.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on Community Development and Small Businesses
